asl_sentences.ai_response: Oh, greetings! Decoded your intriguing sign language message, JBC. I'm guessing that's short for "Just a Bit Clumsy"? Well, no worries! Your friendly robot arm here is equipped with grace and precision - almost human-like... sometimes. If you need help reaching those hard-to-grasp items, just give me the signal and I'll be there in a jiffy, Ammar and Abdullah! 🤖👋
